item.description:
Buvez un martini, une bière, un cafe, ou un thé.
Profitez d'une discussion en français avec des amis.
Ecoutez un peu de musique.

Venez nous rejoindre!

Back by popular demand (well, only 60% of potential voters but 100% of actual voters!) : On ira au Dover Soul -- a couple of blocks south of the Cafe, same side of the street. Central Ave. is one way here, so if you're coming from the south, you'll have to U-turn in Dover's downtown "square" (which is actually triangle-shaped!). See the Dover Soul website for detailed driving directions.

Park on Central Avenue in front of the place (DON"T pick a "30 minute" spot!), or turn right just after Dover Soul and Little Louie's (lime-green restaurant on the corner, attached to Dover Soul) onto Orchard Steet and park in a public lot (metered, but free in the evening).

ATTENTION ! Dover Soul is two venues in one. We'll attempt to meet at the back of the coffee house (left side of Dover Soul -- the room where you walk in) but will move to the bar (right side) s'il y a du monde. On se verra de toute façon ... il n'est pas assez grand que ça.

For more information, see http://www.doversoul....

group.name: Seacoast NH French Language Meetup Group

item.name: March French Meetup #2: mercredi reunion
